Articles.Content:
I.. didnt? I dont know, i only flew on a plane twice in my life.

(overfloater, yes youre right! its sausage!)

TUBM likes copper over iron.

False. I worked with crappy fuel nozzles(/handle?) made from copper.. they break like freaking glass! -___-'''

The user below me drives on the wrong side.

Edited August 12, 2015 by Overfloater

Copper, but mostly for its use in breweries and stills.

TUBM has never left their home country.

False.

TUBM is a robot from Interstellar.

Wrong. I am a doctor from Real Life.

TUBM is dead, Jim.

It's the slow season at work, and my shift is solo starting at 4AM. I usually put my toddler to bed so I don't get to bed myself until 9:30-10:00 PM... Long made short, I feel like it. A lot.

TUBM gets more sleep than I do.

1AM to 9AM? Not sure

TUBM has more than one computer (Computer is a broad term, almost every piece of electronics is a computer)

Yep

TUBM thought there was going to be more stuff in 1.0

Definitely

TOBM (The object below me) is a user.

Yes indeed.

TUBM Has ever written a short story.

Nope. But I have been thinking about it.

The user below me is a girl/woman.

I am. I have white hair as well, in case you were curious.

I drew on your back once.

*sigh* yes hon!

Th user below me plays World of Warships and has a battleship!

I don't play World of Warships, but I do have a battleship.

The user below me has been inside a B-52.

Nope.

TUBM is the user above the user above me.

I am not.

The user below me prefers android over iOS.

True. However, I have never tried iOS.

The user below me has colored hair.

Well, its a colour, but my natural colour, so does that count?

TUBM has an avatar.

Not sure see by yourself ; )

TUBM like soul eating because rule'z 587.

Does not compute.

The user below me never swam in the sea.

False.

The user below me didn't lunch today.

False. I didn't breakfast though.

The user below me hasn't played a video or computer game in over an hour.

True.(It sucked )

The user below hasnt eaten dinner yet.

False. I already gobbled up my foodbits.

The user below me uses forum formatting tools.

False.

TUBM has a cat.
